Text: Many thanksThanks for sending Dr Lu Zimin did a great job and it immeasureably enhanced the credibility of the panel to have someone of his talent attending I am eager as ever to find a way of learning how you guys do it

Re Many thanksI am really sorry that enron is having a tough time of it Zimin is turning out to be a veritable treasure he is thinking about how to apply options valuation to our discovery driven planning methodology It is beyond my capabilities but I have always intuited that this could end up as a very powerful way of handling planning under uncertainty I suspect that we could even develop a much needed software product from it
